com.risk.controller

类 ConqueredController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.risk.controller.ConqueredController
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class ConqueredController
extends java.util.Observable
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • 构造器概要

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void initialize(java.net.URL arg0, java.util.ResourceBundle arg1)
      This method is data binding for connection between controller and UI.
      void moveArmyHandler()
      this method is necessary for moving army into conquered country
      void moveComplete()
      This method ends the conquer move When the number of army moved is equal or more than the number of dice the player rolled Then it allows him to end the move
      void renderView()
      This method for re-rendering the listView
      void setConquringArmy(Country c)
      this method sets the conquered country into listview
      void setDiceRoll(int roll)
      This method sets the number of army to move in ComboBox

    • 方法详细资料

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.net.URL arg0,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle arg1)
        This method is data binding for connection between controller and UI.
        指定者:
        initialize 在接口中 javafx.fxml.Initializable
        另请参阅:
        Initializable

      • moveArmyHandler

        public void moveArmyHandler()
        this method is necessary for moving army into conquered country

      • moveComplete

        public void moveComplete()
        This method ends the conquer move When the number of army moved is equal or more than the number of dice the player rolled Then it allows him to end the move

      • setConquringArmy

        public void setConquringArmy(Country c)
        this method sets the conquered country into listview
        参数:
        c - country that is conquered

      • setDiceRoll

        public void setDiceRoll(int roll)
        This method sets the number of army to move in ComboBox
        参数:
        roll - number of dice rolled to conquer

      • renderView

        public void renderView()
        This method for re-rendering the listView
